titles.title: The Spirit Of God Is Living Inside Of Me

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
The Spirit of God is living inside of me.
The Spirit of God is moving inside of me.
He is moving to comfort me.
He is moving to set me free.
He is moving to lead me.
The Spirit of God is in me.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Chorus:
Move within me, move within me.
Help me surrender without reserve,
Till my whole life reflects Your love.
Move within me, Holy Spirit,
Move within me.
